div.p: SHEKEL, the name of a weight and coin current among the ancient Jews. Dr Arbuthnot makes the weight of the ſhekel equal to 9 pennyweights 2 4 / 7 grains Troy weight ; and the value equal to 2 s. 3 3 / 8 d. Sterling. The golden ſhekel was worth L. 1 : 16 : 6.
